name: Do not look at it
description:
DO NOT LOOK AT IT 

This is a story about survival, made in Twine. There are some light horror elements to the story, inspired by Cthulhu. The protagonist must escape from a catastrophe in which mysterious alien creatures attack Earth and spread an unknown disease.

The choices the player makes while on the run can greatly affect the ending of the story, some of them are choices about morals. The supplies collected also are a key element in determining the direction of the story. There are 11 endings in total, two are secret endings. You can check them in the Endings Collection at the start menu, and see the remaining number of locked endings.
